title: Mark Zuckerberg Promises $1,000 to Facebook Users If They Don’t Share Hoaxes
subtitle: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg's offering money to Facebook users who don't share social media hoaxes is itself a parody of social media  hoaxes.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Mark Zuckerberg is giving $1,000 away to Facebook users who refrain from sharing hoaxes.
